items.sentence: Tom punched John in the stomach and walked away.
You're starting to sound a lot like your father.
It might be safer to live out here in the woods.
If I knew the answer, I wouldn't have asked you.
There are questions to which no one has answers.
I will have to take on someone to do Tom's work.
It's hard to believe that Tom is already thirty.
What do you think Tom is going to do about that?
I think I'm going to ask Tom to stop doing that.
I think that I know somebody that might help us.
